item.description:
Boston SEO Networking Group meets the first Monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Food Event Sponsor:

Special Thanks to KoMarketing Associates, LLC a local B2B SEO Consulting firm for bringing some light snacks & drinks.


Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest?
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?
* Theme for the event:

Share the worst business mistake you made?

Guest Speaker

7:30pm to 8:00pm:

David Wilson
co-owner
Braveheart Design Inc.
http://www.braveheart...

http://social-media-o...

SMO Case Study for SoccorTicketsOnline.com
http://social-media-o...

About the speaker and topic:

Mr. Wilson is the co-owner of Braveheart Design Inc., a search marketing company in New Hampshire. He registered his first web site in 1997 and has spent the last 8 years focused on search marketing with a wide variety of businesses from small start-ups to Fortune 100 companies. David will share client case studies for ways he used social media sites like stumbleupon, digg.com etc to drive seo links for targeted traffic.

Open Round Table Discussion

8:00 to 8:30pm:

Open Topic theme: Social Media

8:15 to 8:30pm Open Round Table Challenge Discussion:

Get Free SEO Consulting From The SEO Pro's That Attend!

Please be specific about your challenge in your website.
3 min max spent on any one business model.

8:30 to 8:45pm:

Open Networking

8:45pm The End

Will head over to Not Your Average Joes across the street for drinks.

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!



----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room. Looking for a speaker for August / September
item.why: You'll walk out with a few good contacts and a hand full of good tips.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Internet Marketing SEO Networking Meetup
